amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for contributions on behalf of the United States to or for the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, or the Green Climate Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 81 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to prohibit the use of funds for contributions on behalf of the United States to or for the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, or the Green Climate Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A078) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 244 (Roll no. 327).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A078) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 244 (Roll no. 327).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A078) offered by Mr. Gosar.
